cast.name: 欧阳万成 Jimmy O. Yang
斯科特·巴库拉 Scott Bakula

introduction: The Arsenio Hall Show is an American late-night talk show created and hosted by Arsenio Hall.[5][6][7] There are two separate programs that have been titled The Arsenio Hall Show, both airing in syndication. The first premiered on January 3, 1989, and ran until May 27, 1994. The second series debuted on September 9, 2013.[8] It was canceled on May 30, 2014.[9] Both series were produced by Hall's production company, Arsenio Hall Communications. The original series was produced and distributed by Paramount Domestic Television and taped at Paramount Studios in Los Angeles, California. Principle photography currently takes place at Sunset Bronson Studios and is produced by Tribune Broadcasting, Octagon Entertainment, and Eye Productions and is distributed by CBS Television Distribution.
